  • Method Details

    • createUser

      Response createUser(CreateUser userDto)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      userDto - the user DTO containing user information
      Returns:
      the response indicating the success or failure of the user creation

    • readAllUsers

      List<UserDto> readAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto objects representing all users

    • readUser

      UserDto readUser(String authId)
      Reads a user from the specified authentication ID.
      Parameters:
      authId - the authentication ID of the user
      Returns:
      the UserDto object representing the user

    • updateUserStatus

      Response updateUserStatus(Long id, UserUpdateStatus userUpdate)
      Updates the status of a user.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user
      userUpdate - the updated status of the user
      Returns:
      the response object indicating the success or failure of the operation

    • updateUser

      Response updateUser(Long id, UserUpdate userUpdate)
      Updates a user.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to be updated
      userUpdate - the updated user information
      Returns:
      the response indicating the success or failure of the update operation

    • readUserById

      UserDto readUserById(Long userId)
      Reads a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to be read
      Returns:
      a UserDto object representing the user with the given ID

    • readUserByAccountId

      UserDto readUserByAccountId(String accountId)
      Reads a user by their account ID.
      Parameters:
      accountId - the account ID of the user
      Returns:
      the UserDto object representing the user with the specified account ID
